search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin, bin not emptied | Rochdale Borough Council
Key Strengths: Offers a dedicated form for reporting missed bins
Provides contact details if help with the form is needed
Recommendations.Reasoning: The item title and snippet directly mention reporting a missing bin, making it the most relevant for council customer information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Report your bin as missed - Rochdale Borough Council
Key Strengths: Directly links to a miss bin collection report form
Recommendations.Reasoning: The item title and link lead to a specific webform for reporting missed bins.

Recommendations.Title: Putting your bins out for collection | Rochdale Borough Council
Key Strengths: Includes information about missed bin criteria and collection process
Recommendations.Reasoning: The snippet mentions reporting a missed bin, while the title suggests it may explain how to prepare bins for collection.

Recommendations.Title: Report an issue online | Apply, report and pay | Rochdale Borough ...
Key Strengths: Allows users to report missed bins online
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not as focused on missing bins, the item still offers a way to report issues such as missing bin collections.

Recommendations.Title: Bins and recycling – Rochdale Borough Council
Key Strengths: Offers a variety of bin-related services including reporting missed bins
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not explicitly dedicated to missing bins, the main page for bins and recycling provides multiple solutions.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: Multiple resources offer methods for reporting missed bin collections or provide relevant information. Although there are differences in focus, all of the options may be helpful for council customers seeking information about bin services.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Rankings were based on the relevance and applicability of each resource to the given instruction.
